news_items.title: Hull prepares for bumper festive weekend of Christmas cheer
news_items.description: Hull city centre will be flooded with festive cheer this November as a full Christmas weekend event fills the streets.

news_items.title: Responding to winter weather
news_items.description: We are encouraging motorists and the travelling public to allow additional time for journeys and to drive to the conditions, following a flurry of winter weather overnight and with the forecast indicating subzero temperatures over the coming days.

news_items.title: Full closure of Drypool Bridge to progress major repair programme
news_items.description: We can confirm that Drypool Bridge will be fully closed to all vehicles and pedestrians from Monday 15 September to late-November 2025.

news_items.title: Postal voters urged to reapply
news_items.description: Electors who applied for a postal vote in or before January 2024, now have to reapply to receive their ballot paper through the post.
